house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1954 has 2 bedroom(s), 1 bath(s) , 1 car garage. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include patio, fireplace, air conditioning, storage space.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Anasazi Realty RE/MAX Anasazi Realty
